name: PLAN / PROCESS Workflow Template
description: Creates the minimal actionable todo backlog for PLAN stage once ingress gates pass.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal PLAN and job.subflow MUST equal PROCESS.
Guard bits MUST remain TRUE, job.halted MUST be FALSE, and lock MUST remain active with job.status=working.
PLAN/INGEST output (scope validation + follow-up list) MUST be available.
Operator MUST state priority focus areas so todos can be scoped.
steps: Load PLAN/INGEST follow-ups and consolidate duplicates.
Draft exactly five trackable todos that cover scope clarification, dependency capture, artifact drafting, review scheduling, and verification prep; log them in todo_tracker.
Tag each todo with owner, due hint, and blocking signals so closure criteria is explicit.
Confirm backlog with operator and document approval status in todo_tracker before advancing to OUT.
outputs: todo_tracker populated with five actionable todos tied to job_id.
Operator acknowledgement recorded next to backlog entries.
acceptance: Backlog MUST list five todos with clear closure criteria and owners.
Todos MUST reference PLAN scope artifacts and cite dependencies.
Operator MUST confirm backlog completeness before OUT work begins.
